description:
Hachiyou is the Student Government President. His personality is very calm and quiet, but with a certain commanding presence - whenever trouble appears, Hachiyou is quick to take charge. He`s a bit like a father figure for the group; with only a word from Hachiyou, even the hot-headed http://anidb.net/ch39364 [Nayuta] and http://anidb.net/ch39365 [Kyouichi] will calm down and follow his lead.
Source: shingu.rightstuf.com
name: Tsumori Hachiyou
